section.name: Repository Access
section.p: Vulcan is hosted on GoogleCode using Subversion.

To check out a working copy, first you'll need a subversion client. If you haven't installed the svn command line tools, do so now. Next, issue this command from your favorite command shell (after puting svn commands into your PATH):
This will create a sub-directory in your current working directory named vulcan, which will contain the source tree for the main web application.
The standard plugins reside in the same repository. Browsing the repository will quickly reveal the path that should be used to check them out.
